description: The object that I want to show you through that virtual is the old beer cellar, which was converted into the bat protection area.The cellar is protected by the grating and can't be accessed. Please respect that, it's to protect the home of the bats! But you're free to see it from outside. The cellar entry is placed near the food/bicycle path and is very easily accessible.Â As the log condition, please post at least one photo on which the cellar is visible. Optionally, write a story about how you got there and what do you feel about the object.Â© GeoLog81, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 07.05.2018;alle LogeintrÃ¤ge Â© jeweiliger Autor
